room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Escape the Room STL in St. Louis
review: This was a great place! Will be back to do more rooms! Staff was amazing and very friendly! We did submarine!

room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Escape the Room STL in St. Louis
review: Ashley was a great clue host! Submarine room was so fun! Would definitely go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Escape the Room STL in St. Louis
review: My wife and friends surprised me with this forMy birthday. It was a great, fun, entertaining hour! We did the submarine room. It was probably one of the more detailed sets Iâ€™ve seen. It also had a really interesting use of technology as both an part of the environment and part of the clues. We had 8 people, and needed nearly all of them to escape. With 3 minutes left.The professionalism and friendliness of this staff was also great. I would highly recommend and I will be going back to try their clock tower room soon.
